thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 11 of 3586
thread.title: Devon

author: Devon
title: Devon
text: Growing up I was taught to keep a healthy level of skepticism about you, because if it seems too good to be true it probably is. So, obviously, I was hesitant to order books from ThriftBooks.com initially. My first transaction was for $15 and I got five books.. talk about a steal! The first thing that impressed me was the "go green" options. I believe well-loved books are the best books and wasn't concerned with the quality, we long as it was "acceptable". After my confirmation email, I received TWO shipment emails a few hours later! Talk about prompt service!! I was thrilled. I tricked the books online for roughly a week and was thrilled when they arrived in great condition and eco friendly wrapping. I immediately took to Facebook to share this resource with my book-loving friends and they were as amazed as I was. Thank you for a reliable site with solid values, eco-conscious practices, and a plethora of titles. I couldn't be happier!
